medical staff, we feel that resting Allen Iverson for the remainder of the season is the best course of action at this time,'' Pistons president of basketball operations Joe Dumars said in a statement released by the team. While he has played in our last three games, he is still feeling some discomfort and getting him physically ready to compete at the level he is accustomed to playing this late in the season does not seem possible at this point. TNT analyst David Aldridge reports that Joe Dumars and Allen Iverson arrived at the decision to bench the All-Star during a meeting on Friday. During the meeting, according to Joe Dumars , Allen Iverson apologized for his post-game comments Wednesday in New Jersey
